name: ec2-start-stop-cdk
description: AWS CDK project for automated EC2 instance start/stop scheduling

scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:lambda && pnpm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && cd lambda && rm -rf dist
scripts.deploy:dev: pnpm run build:all && cdk deploy --profile kbj-aws-dev
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm run build:all && cdk deploy --profile sps-production
scripts.check: pnpm run format:check && pnpm run lint && pnpm test
scripts.fix: pnpm run format && pnpm run lint:fix
scripts.precommit:simple: pnpm run format && pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run build:all && pnpm run test
scripts.precommit:bash: bash scripts/precommit.sh 2>/dev/null || (echo "‚ùå Pre-commit checks failed. Fix the issues above and try again." && exit 1)
